mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(message_id, commenter_id, comment_target_id, reply_id, is_read, message_content) VALUES(#{messageId}, #{commenterId}, #{commentTargetId}, #{replyId}, #{isRead}, #{messageContent})
mapper.select: SELECT message_id, commenter_id, comment_target_id, reply_id, is_read, message_content FROM MESSAGE WHERE message_id = #{value}
